channel.title: First then second
channel.description: hi i would like to know how you put something first then second. i know that sounded confusing so, lets say there is a dialogue box. I want it to first open up all the dialogue then close the last dialogue box. Because i put removeallwindow(); last and everybox opens then when u click next, it closes then opens up a new box. i just want it to close on the last box. thanks for the help

item.title: First then second
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:3, topic:401852”][quote author=I InDrEk I link=topic=498908.msg3648487#msg3648487 date=1309553591]
Wtf?
[/quote][/quote]

Ok so there is 5 dialogue boxes i want to open up for the player when they first log in. After you click “click here to continue” the first box closes, which shows the chatbox, then goes onto the next box. I dont want that to happen. I want it to be you click “click here to continue” but it doesnt close and just goes onto the next box without closing the first. Make more sense?

Read full topic
